lead_paragraph: The company released its long-delayed fourth-quarter financial results that included a write down of 6.2 billion reais — about $2.1 billion.

headline.print_headline: Scandal Leads to a Big Loss for Petrobras
headline.main: Corruption Scandal Leads to a Big Loss for Petrobras

snippet: The company released its long-delayed fourth-quarter financial results that included a write down of 6.2 billion reais — about $2.1 billion.
abstract: Petrobas reports write down of 6.2 billion reais, or about $2.1 billion, in its delayed fourth-quarter filing, which was due to kickback scheme from 2004 to 2012 in which executives took bribes in exchange for inflated contracts to suppliers; release of audited results marks first step for company to access international credit markets and regain investor confidence.
